channel.title: Changing gs requirements
channel.description:
i was wondering how to change the requirements of a godsword so instead of you needing like 65 def and 70 attack you only need 70 to use it. can you please tell me thanks :)
also how do i fix a glitched dds and dscim thy are un-equipable
